moduleMetadataJson.name: DNS Server Dynamic Update Record Injection
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module allows adding and/or deleting a record to
        any remote DNS server that allows unrestricted dynamic updates.
author: King Sabri <king.sabri@gmail.com>
Brent Cook <brent_cook@rapid7.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOST
options.description: The vulnerable DNS server IP address

options.name: HOSTNAME
options.description: The name record you want to add

options.name: IP
options.description: The IP you want to assign to the record

options.name: VALUE
options.description: The string to be added with TXT or CNAME record

options.name: TYPE
options.description: The record type you want to add. (Accepted: A, AAAA, CNAME, TXT)

options.name: CHOST
options.description: The source address to use for queries and updates
